entry.title: An agent-based model to simulate the boosted Sterile Insect Technique for fruit fly management
entry.content:
An agent-based model to simulate the boosted Sterile Insect Technique for fruit fly management

entry.title: Annotation of epidemiological information in animal disease-related news articles: guidelines and manually labelled corpus
entry.content:
Annotation of epidemiological information in animal disease-related news articles: guidelines and manually labelled corpus
Mar 7, 2022 - UMR TETIS
Valentin Sarah; De Waele Valérie; Vilain Aline; Arsevska Elena; Lancelot Renaud; Roche Mathieu, 2019, "Annotation of epidemiological information in animal disease-related news articles: guidelines and manually labelled corpus", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/YGAKNB, CIRAD Dataverse, V2, UNF:6:H+qzG30RSQ4fWYYA2UBwEQ== [fileUNF]
This dataset contains two files: (i) An annotated corpus ("epi_info_corpus.xlsx") containing 486 manually annotated sentences extracted from 32 animal disease-related news articles. These news articles were obtained from the database of an event-based biosurveillance system dedic...

entry.title: DATA4C+ - A thesaurus to define land management practices in agriculture and forestry for soil carbon storage
entry.content:
DATA4C+ - A thesaurus to define land management practices in agriculture and forestry for soil carbon storage
Feb 28, 2022 - AIDA
Demenois, Julien; Fujisaki, Kenji; Chevallier, Tiphaine; Bispo, Antonio; Laurent, Jean-Baptiste; Thévenin, François; Chapuis-Lardy, Lydie; Cardinael, Rémi; Freycon, Vincent; Bénédet, Fabrice; Le Bas, Christine; Tella, Marie; Blanfort, Vincent; Brossard, Michel, 2022, "DATA4C+ - A thesaurus to define land management practices in agriculture and forestry for soil carbon storage", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/HMCPMF, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
DATA4C+ is a thesaurus classifying and defining land management practices in agriculture and forestry for soil carbon storage. DATA4C+ thesaurus is focussed on land management practices identified in the scientific literature as drivers of soil organic carbon (SOC) changes. DATA4...

entry.title: Breeding phenology in the parsley frog, Pelodytes punctatus
entry.content:
Breeding phenology in the parsley frog, Pelodytes punctatus
Feb 21, 2022 - SCOBIM
Jourdan, Hélène, 2022, "Breeding phenology in the parsley frog, Pelodytes punctatus", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/2TOXXV, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
This dataset contains all data collected during a 3 year-survey around Montpellier to study the breeding phenology and breeding success of the anuran Pelodytes punctatus.

SCOBIM(CIRAD)
Feb 21, 2022UMR ASTRE

entry.title: Jeu de données sur l'abondance des invertébrés du sol en fonction des pratiques agricoles dans les bananeraies de Martinique
entry.content:
Jeu de données sur l'abondance des invertébrés du sol en fonction des pratiques agricoles dans les bananeraies de Martinique
Feb 16, 2022 - UPR GECO
El Jaouhari, Meryem; Coulis, Mathieu, 2022, "Jeu de données sur l'abondance des invertébrés du sol en fonction des pratiques agricoles dans les bananeraies de Martinique", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/FBZYCT, CIRAD Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:4ZfUCPdUHjpM4MGgv3VJeg== [fileUNF]
[FR]Jeu de données sur l'abondance des invertébrés du sol collectés entre le 24/03/2018 et le 21/06/2018 dans des bananeraies, des forêts et des jachères enherbées de Martinique. 250 prélèvements ont été réalisés dans 25 parcelles à l'aide de quadrats de 25 x 25 cm. La litière ai...

entry.title: Profitability assessment of the Coffee agroforestry business driven clusters (CaFC)
entry.content:
Profitability assessment of the Coffee agroforestry business driven clusters (CaFC)
Feb 16, 2022 - UMR DIADE
Meter, Andrew; Penot, Eric; Vaast, Philippe; Etienne, Hervé; Ponçon, Eric; Bertrand, Benoit, 2022, "Profitability assessment of the Coffee agroforestry business driven clusters (CaFC)", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/8RKHFX, CIRAD Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:zZXzMKjevYvClZiNBmTKHg== [fileUNF]
The profitability assessment is based on data on costs and yields per hectare for the F1 hyrbid variety 'Starmaya' and a local variety.

UMR DIADE(CIRAD, IRD, Université de Montpellier)
Feb 16, 2022
DIversity - Adaptation - plant DEvelopment The DIADE Research Unit aims to understand the diversification of tropical plants, one of the main original reservoirs of biodiversity, and for which conservation, management and exploitation are an important issue for Sustainable Develo...

entry.title: Jeu de données sur des systèmes agroforestiers à palmier à huile capitalisés en 2020 dans le monde.
entry.content:
Jeu de données sur des systèmes agroforestiers à palmier à huile capitalisés en 2020 dans le monde.
Feb 15, 2022 - UMR Innovation
Masure, Alix; Lacan, Xavier; Rafflegeau, Sylvain, 2022, "Jeu de données sur des systèmes agroforestiers à palmier à huile capitalisés en 2020 dans le monde.", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/NQ7WJD, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
Ce jeu de données décrit 39 systèmes agroforestiers à base de palmier à huile identifiés dans le monde en 2020 par traque aux innovations. Une typologie de systèmes agroforestiers est présentée dans un article lié à ce jeu de données. Le jeu de données du fichier Excel présente :...

entry.title: A global database of land management, land-use change and climate change effects on soil organic carbon
entry.content:
A global database of land management, land-use change and climate change effects on soil organic carbon
Feb 14, 2022 - Meta-analysis_Soil_carbon
Beillouin, Damien; Demenois, Julien; Cardinael, Rémi; Berre, David; Corbeels, Marc; Fallot, Abigaïl; Boyer, Annie; Feder, Frédéric, 2021, "A global database of land management, land-use change and climate change effects on soil organic carbon", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/KKPLR8, CIRAD Dataverse, V2
This dataset comprises data from a systematic review done after a comprehensive literature search using Scopus, Web of Science, Ovid publisher and Google Scholar for peer-reviewed meta-analyses and systematic reviews up to early 2020 that reported on soil organic carbon. This glo...
